name: Beach Front Beat Down EX
description:
Help Fro save the ladies of the beach from Mean Mo. There is not much more to say, get to punching! This game was developed for PGMMV Summer Game Jam 2020.

  • Controls are in the READ_ME.txt
  • Comment below with your fastest beat down time!

-Low.Res-
